stripped_text: The first time each turn a successful run on a remote server ends, if you breached the server but stole no agendas, you may place 1 power counter on this resource. When this resource has 4 or more hosted power counters, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text:
The first time each turn a successful run on a remote server ends, if you breached the server but stole no agendas, you may place 1 power counter on this resource.
When this resource has 4 or more hosted power counters, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: Kasi String
